author: psteitz
msg: Nulled apache.releases by default to prevent accidental deploys to the
Added build profiles for releases and rcs, named 'release', 'rc' resp.
'mvn -Prelease deploy' will deploy to rsynched repo and
'mvn -Prc deploy' will deploy non-snapshot versions to snapshot repo.
